info.author: Peter Vierstrom
info.description:
EpubNanny
===========

Tool set to automate certain tasks of creating an ePUB file.

* create an initial directory skeleton
* add chapters
* add image cover
* pack a directory into an .ePUB file
* unpack a no-DRM .ePUB file into a directory
info.name: EpubNanny
info.summary: Tool set to automate certain tasks of creating an ePUB file.
